personas.title: Chief Financial Officer
personas.hypothesis: As the CFO, they are responsible for budget approvals. Highlight cost efficiency and ROI to align with their financial objectives.

personas.title: Head of Human Resources
personas.hypothesis: This role is crucial for driving the adoption of solutions that impact workforce management. Engage them by showing how the solution aligns with HR initiatives.

personas.title: IT Manager
personas.hypothesis: They assess technical requirements and integrations. Address any technical specifications and integrations with existing systems.

personas.title: Head of Change Management
personas.hypothesis: They are likely to shape the organizational approach to new tools. Demonstrate how the solution supports change management processes.

personas.title: Senior Outplacement Consultant
personas.hypothesis: Ensure that the solution enhances their daily operations and effectiveness in delivering their services.
